meanings.definition: To apply a liquid or lotion to the skin as a remedy or pain reliever.
meanings.sent1: She embrocated the soothing ointment on her sunburned skin.
meanings.sent2: After a long day of work, he embrocated his sore muscles with a cooling gel.
meanings.sent3: The athlete embrocated his legs before the race, hoping for a speed boost.
meanings.sent4: The chef embrocated the meat with a special marinade to enhance its flavor.
meanings.sent5: The gardener embrocated the plant leaves with a nutrient-rich solution for better growth.
